member.name: PARTITION_STYLE
member.summary: Represents the format of a partition.

member.name: PARTITION_STYLE.PARTITION_STYLE_MBR
member.summary: Master boot record (MBR) format. This corresponds to standard AT-style MBR partitions.

member.name: PARTITION_STYLE.PARTITION_STYLE_RAW
member.summary: Partition not formatted in either of the recognized formats—MBR or GPT.
